3: Kamui, what's the situation on your end?
Captain, there are no Ascendants around here, but I found a...
Monster with a lot of spikes... uh... it looks quite... terrifying...
That's 'Iron Maiden.' She's not your main target, leave her to other squads. Don't do stupid things.
But we already made eye contact.
What? You... (Sighs) Hold your fort until I get there!
A mere Construct, showing itself before me alone...
Um, just passing by, here to find out about this 'Ascendant' hot topic.
Oh? You're interested in becoming an Ascendant as well?
Uh, not really! We're just trying to find the Ascendants and... give them a good beating!
